TopicTitle: [Bug] Anyone else notice a problem with quick-saves?

Articles.Content: In career mode it appears that when I use quicksave several times during a single mission my money sets itself to 0 and upon completion I end up with only the money I earned after the load, anyone else getting this?

> 
> In career mode it appears that when I use quicksave several times during a single mission my money sets itself to 0 and upon completion I end up with only the money I earned after the load, anyone else getting this?

I quicksaved once and quickloaded 3 times, I'm not noticing anything.
Have not noticed this myself -- would upload logs and screens to help!

This happened to me last night. So frustrating. My Career is over!

1. Launches vessel

2. Revert to VAB

3. Exit to KSC

Result: All money is gone ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
It's usually a graphics bug, your money is probably still there.

> 
> It's usually a graphics bug, your money is probably still there.

I had my disappear in flight once so far, but when I switched back to the Space Center my money was all there still. So I am also thinking its some kind of graphical bug. I wasn't sure if it was a stock bug or Kerbel Alarm Clock, which I also use to jump between ships.

> 
> I had my disappear in flight once so far, but when I switched back to the Space Center my money was all there still. So I am also thinking its some kind of graphical bug. I wasn't sure if it was a stock bug or Kerbel Alarm Clock, which I also use to jump between ships.

Suffered the same. This bug dates back to 0.25, actually. Was in an expedition, reverted, and when I viewed my money and reputation in-flight, they were reset to zero. But as soon as I accomplished a contract or went back to KSC it would reset itself to normal.

It's a purely aesthetic bug, fortunately. There are a number of points where the refresh routine for funds, reputation, and science should be called, but are not. Another one is after accepting a contract: reputation and science don't get updated, though Funds do. So if you have a strategy that converts funds to reputation or science, you won't see the change (or have access to the benefits) until you switch to a scene that refreshes those two values.
